headline.print_headline: Australia Fights Tobacco With Taxes and Plain Packs
headline.seo: Australia Fights Tobacco With Plain Packaging
headline.main: Australia Fights Tobacco With Taxes and Plain Packs

byline.original: By BETTINA WASSENER   and MERAIAH FOLEY

docs.lead_paragraph: Proposed rules would increase a tax on tobacco products and, starting July 2012, restrict the use of logos and colors on packaging.
docs.snippet: Proposed rules would increase a tax on tobacco products and, starting July 2012, restrict the use of logos and colors on packaging.
